title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: possible development.  The absence of large waves will also be
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: very favourable to sea-spiders, which will be able to run at
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: tremendous speeds.  The constancy in the eruptions of the
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: volcanoes will offer a great field to Jovian inventors, who will
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: unquestionably be able to utilize their heat for the production
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: of steam or electricity, to say nothing of an inexhaustible
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: supply of valuable chemicals.  They may contain the means of
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: producing some force entirely different from apergy, and as
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: superior to electricity as that is to steam.  Our earthly
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: volcanoes have been put to slight account because of the long
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: intervals between eruptions."

author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: After leaving Sylvialand they went westward to the eastern of the
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: two crescent continents.  It was separated from the island by
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: about six thousand miles of ocean, and had less width than the
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: western, having about the proportions of a three-day crescent,
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: while the western had the shape of the moon when four or five
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: days old.  They found the height of the mountains and plateaus
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: somewhat less than on the eastern continent, but no great
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: the pole, the vegetation became more like that of Scotland or a
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: north temperate region than any they had seen.  On reaching
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: the speckled condition they had observed there.  They found a
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: vast archipelago covering as great an area as the whole Pacific
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: Ocean.  The islands varied from the size of Borneo and Madagascar
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: to that of Sicily and Corsica, while some contained but a few
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: square miles.  The surface of the archipelago was about equally
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: divided between land and water.

author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: shortest course through these groups."
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: on earth, and the leaves on many were turning yellow and red, for
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: colour, perhaps by merely ripening them.  When a ripe leaf falls
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: off, its place is doubtless soon taken by a bud, for germination
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: and fructification go on side by side."
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: Archipelago, since so much of the knowledge appertaining to it
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: miles of each other.  The eastern extension was split like the
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: tail of a fish, the great bay formed thereby being filled with
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: islands, which also extended about half of the distance across.
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: running out for miles just below the surface of the water.

author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: After this the travellers flew northward at great speed in the
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: upper regions of the air, for they were anxious to hasten their
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: As their outside thermometer, when just above the placid
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: water--for there were no waves here--registered twenty- one
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: degrees Fahrenheit, they accounted for this scarcity of ice by
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: fact that it was not cold enough to congeal the very salt
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: sea-water.

author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: extent, the larger islands of which were covered with a sheet of
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: breaking off and slowly floating.  Finding a small island on
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: which the coating was thin, they grounded the Callisto, and
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: stepped out for the first time in several days.  The air was so
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: still that a small piece of paper released at a height of six
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: feet sank slowly and went as straight as the string of a
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: plumb-line.  The sun was bisected by the line of the horizon, and
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

text: may best get below the frozen surface?"

author: Astor, John Jacob

text: hundred feet of the Callisto, or much nearer than an equivalent

author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: windows will be blown out, while the safe remains uninjured.
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: it will be destroyed, while the glass panes are not even cracked.
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: case, and the safe in the second."

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future

author: Astor, John Jacob

text: a few feet to be as warm as toast."
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future

text: archipelago, but was itself at the exact pole, it followed that
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future

author: Astor, John Jacob

title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

text: melt, by keeping in the heat constantly given off by the warm

text: planet.

author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

text: result of Jupiter's great flattening at the poles and the drawing

author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

author: Astor, John Jacob

text: enthusiastically, "the more charmed I become.  It almost exactly

author: Astor, John Jacob

text: will ease the work of operating railways, and the atmosphere's
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob

text: density will be just the thing for our flying machines, while
title: A Journey in Other Worlds: A Romance of the Future
author: Astor, John Jacob
